title: Audit & Controls Specialist (Team Lead)
job_overview:
Company: Contentas Ventures
Location: Remote (Philippines)
Role Type: Full-time


About Us:

Contentas Ventures is a venture capital firm based in Europe. We support our portfolio companies with hands-on services across finance, compliance, HR, marketing, and sales, helping them grow with speed and confidence.

Our growing remote team plays a vital role in delivering these services with professionalism and reliability. We believe in building lean, high-performing teams that value ownership, clarity, and continuous improvement.

Join us and help shape the operational backbone of some of the most exciting startups in Europe.


About the Role:

We are hiring a Team Lead (Audit & Controls Specialist) to oversee a remote accounting team delivering shared finance and compliance services to our growing portfolio of startups. This role spans leadership, quality control, and cross-functional coordination.


Responsibilities:

- Supervise a team of 5 specialists (AR, AP, Reconciliation, Reporting & Compliance, Payroll & HR)

- Review outputs, ensure process consistency, and coach teaUpgrade to see actual infombers

- Lead audit preparation and internal control efforts

- Coordinate deadlines, KPIs, and escalations with stakeholders

- Drive continuous improvement and knowledge sharing across the team


Qualifications:

- 5+ years in accounting or audit roles, with at least 2 in team leadership

- Experience with international clients

- Deep knowledge of financial workflows and audit principles

- Strong communication, project coordination, and mentoring skills
